text: In the Shadows () is a 2010 German crime film directed by Thomas Arslan. The film premiered at the 2010 Berlin International Film Festival, and released to German theatres on 7 October 2010. == Cast == * Mišel Matičević as Trojan * Karoline Eichhorn as Dora Hillmann * Uwe Bohm as Meyer * Rainer Bock as Nico * David Scheller as Martin Krüger * Peter Kurth as Richard Bauer * Hanns Zischler as Der Planer * as Dragan == References == == External links == * Category:2010 crime films Category:German crime films Category:German films Category:Films about organized crime in Germany
title: In the Shadows (2010 film)
